column4: Therefore, taking  into  consideration the  delay on the part of the Appellants

column3: Respondents  in  granting  the  relief prayed  for  at  this  stage,  the  application  for  a
writ of Certiorari should be refused.

column4: Accordingly, the Petition is dismissed without costs.

column8: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
